nodes.text: Warlord Throsk was a male Gamorrean. By the time of the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, Throsk had commanded the guard retinues of several crime bosses, all of which had died on the warlord's order.
Several months into the blockade, Thosk joined the crew of the Smuggler, who sent him on a variety of missions across the Anoat sector.
